abstract: Robert C. Lachky, who in his role as chief creative officer at Anheuser-Busch is one of the most influential forces in deciding which television commercials consumers see, is leaving the company.
snippet: Robert C. Lachky, who in his role as chief creative officer at Anheuser-Busch is one of the most influential forces in deciding which television commercials consumers see, is leaving the company.
lead_paragraph: Robert C. Lachky, who in his role as chief creative officer at Anheuser-Busch is one of the most influential forces in deciding which television commercials consumers see, is leaving the company.

headline.main: Leading Creator of TV Beer Ads Hangs Up His Mug
